instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3115 - Need clean ME SPI ROM
threads.message:
original u6100 chip was damaged by corrosion, trace to pin 8 (pp3v3_sus) was missing. i fixed with a jumper.
i was not able to use the original chip, i then used another u6100 from a donor board and booted fine.

can someone make me a clean ME with serial number and Fsys?

C02JWW4QDTY3


cheers

threads.title: 820-3115 - Need clean ME SPI ROM
threads.message:
hi 2informaticos
the file is corrupted. can you reupload please.
thank you

threads.title: 820-3115 - Need clean ME SPI ROM
threads.message:
file is ok now for some reason.

i've used the ROM but Fsys need patching otherwise will say system serial number unavailable in ASD. however the serial works fine in OSX
i've no idea how to patch Fsys :(

also sensor tests are missing.

[IMG type="full" width="200px"]https://i.imgur.com/9lKVmTD.jpg[/IMG][IMG type="full" width="200px"]https://i.imgur.com/DzC8OTm.jpg[/IMG]

threads.title: 820-3115 - Need clean ME SPI ROM
threads.message:
can you use this rom from a donor board or different one?

[URL="https://drive.google.com/file/d/15f-eNCS2LYCYcZf74Z6XjrV0217QrBwN/view?usp=sharing"]https://drive.google.com/file/d/15f-...ew?usp=sharing[/URL]

threads.title: 820-3115 - Need clean ME SPI ROM
threads.message:
Donor board doesn't have clean ME region!!!

Medusa 2 can fix the checksum error.
Normally entire Fsys is moved from backup to new BIOS.
But you don't have a backup...

threads.title: 820-3115 - Need clean ME SPI ROM
threads.message:
i know, i was thinking using it then make it clean ME region

ohh i do have original rom but i dont trust it, the chip dont work on the logic board. the minipro can read it alright most of the time. give me a sec.

threads.title: 820-3115 - Need clean ME SPI ROM
threads.message:
here: [url]https://drive.google.com/file/d/1h1_uhpTDzhn2xA_rdEjnwJAXB9vCzz9U/view?usp=sharing[/url]

i've read the chip for 3 times, checksum doesn't match

threads.title: 820-3115 - Need clean ME SPI ROM
threads.message:
dump is getting more consistent with heat. check 3-5 dumps.

[URL="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1h1_uhpTDzhn2xA_rdEjnwJAXB9vCzz9U/view?usp=sharing"]https://drive.google.com/file/d/1h1_...ew?usp=sharing[/URL]

threads.title: 820-3115 - Need clean ME SPI ROM
threads.message:
